metadata.synopsis: A family of refugees plead for the Open Hand Temple to open its doors for them again. They rely on the charity of the church to survive and mourn the death of the Head Priest too. This is the tiefling dad's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - go to -10;47; -5- Talk to the tiefling father of the Desperate Refugee vignette in front of the Open Hand Temple

0.speaker: Leucis Kallista
0.text: If you're looking for Ilmater's charity, you're out of luck. They've turned their backs on us - like everyone else.

1.speaker: Leucis Kallista
1.text: Watch your step inside the temple - one of their priests got cut to ribbons, and they're looking for someone to blame.
